cRefPattern.p: This pattern references a specific line.
This pattern references an inscribed surface on an object.

div.l: She held the lapis measuring rod and line
As Inanna was entering the first gate
The man removed the turban, the crown of the plain, that was upon her head
Be satisfied, Inanna! This is the rite of the netherworld that is being completed
Inanna! This is the procedure of the netherworld, you should not speak aloud
As Inanna was entering the 2nd gate
The man removed the wig/allure that was upon her forehead
Be satisfied, Inanna! This is the rite of the netherworld that is being completed(?)
